front.title: Considerations for SRv6 MSD Limitation in PCEP

abstract.t: This document analyzes the impact of different SRv6 MSDs when PCE sends SR-TE paths to the PCE. And it updates the MSD restrictions in RFC9603 based on the analysis. This document also specifies a procedure for optimizing the number of SIDs in an SRv6-TE path that PCE can compute when the reduced SRH mode is used.
